Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Relates to the licensure of athletic trainers; and adds athletic trainers to the list of persons and officials required to report cases of suspected child abuse or maltreatment
Summary: Relates to the licensure of athletic trainers; adds athletic trainers to the list of persons and officials required to report cases of suspected child abuse or maltreatment.
LawCode: Amd Ed L, generally; amd ยง413, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the licensure of athletic trainers; and to amend the social services law, in relation to adding athletic trainers to the list of persons and officials required to report cases of suspected child abuse or maltreatment
